definition: branch/stem/stalk/CL:根[gen1]/to block/to hinder/(Tw) interesting, fresh, or amusing subject matter or scenario

sentences.english: Objective To treat acute myocardial infarction with cardiogenic shock by emegency PCI.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討急性心肌梗死合併心源性休克的搶救方法。

sentences.english: Infarct size was determined by TTC staining method.
sentences.chinese: TTC染色法檢測心肌梗死麪積。

sentences.english: To reconstruct the 3-dimensioanal image of heart and the region of myocardial ischemia from 2-dimensioanal tomogram of electron beam CT (EBCT).
sentences.chinese: 研究電子束CT心肌梗死部位及形態的三維圖象重建。

sentences.english: Four things in particular are the most sinister signs of a silent heart attack.
sentences.chinese: 四種症狀是心肌梗死病發的最危險的症狀。

sentences.english: How to evaluate the relationship of between ARBs and myocardial infarction?
sentences.chinese: 如何看待ARB與心肌梗死的關係？

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the effects factors on myocardial oxygen consumption(MVO_2) for patients with acute myocardial infarction(AMI) in the early stage.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析急性心肌梗死早期病人心肌耗氧量影響因素。

sentences.english: Especialy, the change of the leukocyte IF was more obviously in acute myocardial infarction patients.
sentences.chinese: 這種變化在急性心肌梗死時尤爲明顯。

sentences.english: Conclusion Pre-hospital thrombolysis treatment in AMI increases the clinical effect and it is safe.
sentences.chinese: 結論急性心肌梗死院前溶栓臨牀療效提高，而且安全。

sentences.english: Conclusions The next wall myocardial infarction concurrent arrythmia are more, the mortality rate is also higher.
sentences.chinese: 結論下壁心肌梗死併發心律失常更多，死亡率也更高。

sentences.english: How to ealuate the relationship of between ARBs and myocardial infarction?
sentences.chinese: 如何看待ARB與心肌梗死的關係？

sentences.english: In patients who present with concomitant left bundle branch block, the electrocardiographic manifestations of acute myocardial injury may be masked.
sentences.chinese: 當心肌梗死合併左束支阻滯時，心電圖診斷變得困難。

sentences.english: Myocardial infarction almost always results from occlusive coronary artery atherosclerosis.
sentences.chinese: 心肌梗死常發生於冠狀動脈粥樣硬化閉塞。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the specificity of Dmin (D m) in the postmortem diagnosis of early myocardial infarction.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討結蛋白在早期心肌梗死死後診斷的特異性。

sentences.english: Acute myocardial infarction is a very serious disease with a high mortality.
sentences.chinese: 急性心肌梗死是冠心病中的危重症，病死率高。

sentences.english: Patients with nocturnal onset of MI have a high likelihood of having OSA.
sentences.chinese: 夜間發作心肌梗死的患者併發有OSA的可能性很高。

definition: abbr. for 心肌梗塞[xin1 ji1 geng3 sai1], myocardial infarction/heart attack
